long_description: The Shimano XT M771 10-speed cassette offers a 4-arm sprocket that prevents deflection, resulting in superb performance and light weight. 5 largest sprockets are supported by a 5-arm light alloy carrier that reduces weight and increases stiffness. Choose from 11 - 36 or 11 - 34 sizes.
short_description: The Shimano XT M771 10-speed cassette offers a 4-arm sprocket that prevents deflection, resulting in superb performance and light weight.
